summary:
This mod replaces the two-handed sword animations.
Current version changes only:
Idle, Equip, Turn, Walk, run and sprint.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][b]
This is compatible with Skyrim v1.6 update, I think.
If anyone find a bug of my mod, please report at forum. ;)
[/b][/color]

Small update
[img]http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m3xkweR1Me1rrx7nzo1_500.jpg[/img]


======================================================================
YY Anim Replacer - Zweih√§nder
							[color=yellow][b]v0.6.8[/b][/color]
							2012-5-13
======================================================================
This mod replaces the two-handed weapon animations. 
Current version changes only:
Idle, Equip, Block, Turn, Walk, Run and Sprint.

[youtube]qtG9pWmAwe0[/youtube]
[youtube]nPNzk65Nww4[/youtube]
[youtube]hTRTYqPcOfo[/youtube]
======================================================================
Installation
======================================================================
NMM ready package.
2hm_sprintforwardsword_D1.HkX is an optional file. Remove \"_D1\" when you use.

[color=red][b]YOU CANNOT ACTIVATE \"Male ver.\" and \"Female ver.\" AT THE SAME TIME![/b][/color]


======================================================================
Uninstallation
======================================================================
Simply uncheck my mod on NMM or

Delete the files as follows:
data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations\\
	2hc_equip.HkX
	2hm_blockidle.HkX
	2hm_idle.HkX
	2hm_runbackward.HkX
	2hm_runbackwardleft.HkX
	2hm_runbackwardright.HkX
	2hm_runforward.HkX
	2hm_runforwardleft.HkX
	2hm_runforwardright.HkX
	2hm_runleft.HkX
	2hm_runright.HkX
	2hm_runstrafeleft.HkX
	2hm_runstraferight.HkX
	2hm_sprintforwardsword.HkX
	2hm_sprintforwardsword_D1.HkX
	2hm_turnleft60.HkX
	2hm_turnleft180.HkX
	2hm_turnright60.HkX
	2hm_turnright180.HkX
	2hm_walkbackward.HkX
	2hm_walkbackwardleft.HkX
	2hm_walkbackwardright.HkX
	2hm_walkforward.HkX
	2hm_walkforwardleft.HkX
	2hm_walkforwardright.HkX
	2hm_walkleft.HkX
	2hm_walkright.HkX
	2hw_idle.HkX
	2hw_runarmblend.HkX
	2hw_walkarmblend.HkX

======================================================================
Known Issues
======================================================================
-It looks strange when block enemy\'s attack.
-Weapon\'s grip penetrate left hand when blocking.
-Desync problem (when equipping battleaxe or warhammer)

======================================================================
Changelog
======================================================================
v0.6.8 2012-5-13
+Battleaxes and Warhammers are supported
	2hw_idle.HkX
	2hw_runarmblend.HkX
	2hw_walkarmblend.HkX
+Provided \"PC Exclusive Animation Path\" compatible package
	20 ESP plugins and fixed defaultmale.hkx
*2hm_sprintforwardsword_D2, less head shaking of upper body
*2hm_walkforward, fixed position of right arm


v0.6.4 2012-5-09
!Fixed twisted fingers bug
!Fixed all the loop bug
*New Idle anim for female character (less shaking of the right arm, reflecting opinions)
[color=yellow]I wanna make this idle anim more smooth later[/color]
*New type of left/right walk and strafe anims for female to fix bunny-hop problem

v0.6.0 2012-5-05 (Featuring male ver.)
+Added male version of:
	2hm_idle.HkX
	2hm_runbackward.HkX
	2hm_runbackwardleft.HkX
	2hm_runbackwardright.HkX
	2hm_runforward.HkX
	2hm_runforwardleft.HkX
	2hm_runforwardright.HkX
	2hm_runleft.HkX
	2hm_runright.HkX
	2hm_runstrafeleft.HkX
	2hm_runstraferight.HkX
	2hm_walkbackward.HkX
	2hm_walkbackwardleft.HkX
	2hm_walkbackwardright.HkX
	2hm_walkforward.HkX
	2hm_walkforwardleft.HkX
	2hm_walkforwardright.HkX
	2hm_walkleft.HkX
	2hm_walkright.HkX
*New type of left/right walk and strafe anims
!No loop bug (male ver.)
!Fixed bunny-hop problem (male ver.)
?Female version has not updated


v0.5.0 2012-5-03 (Nexus release)
+Added 2hm_blockidle
+Added 2hm_sprintforwardsword
	2hm_sprintforwardsword_D1 is optional
+Added 2hm_runstraferight
!Improved walkright animation slightly
*Replaced 2hm_runstrafeleft to ver.2


v0.4.2 2012-5-01
*2hm_runforward, changed style
+Added running animations:
	2hm_runbackward
	2hm_runbackwardleft
	2hm_runbackwardright
	2hm_runforward
	2hm_runforwardleft
	2hm_runforwardright
	2hm_runleft
	2hm_runright
	2hm_runstrafeleft
!Improved walkleft animation slightly
?Some walking animations are still bugged


v0.3.0 2012-4-22
+Added walking animations:
	2hm_walkbackward.hkx
	2hm_walkbackwardleft.hkx
	2hm_walkbackwardright.hkx
	2hm_walkforward.hkx
	2hm_walkforwardleft.hkx
	2hm_walkforwardright.hkx
	2hm_walkleft.hkx
	2hm_walkright.hkx
+Added 2hm_runforward
?Some walking animations are played strangely


v0.2.0 2012-4-14
*2hm_idle, more oblique stance
+Added turn animations:
	2hm_turnleft60
	2hm_turnleft180
	2hm_turnright180
+Added 2hm_equip


v0.1.2 2012-4-13
!2hm_idle, fixed loop bug
*Changed right hand\'s position
+2hm_idle, added right hand fingers\' animation
+Added 2hm_turnright60


v0.1.0 2012-4-09 (Initial Release)
+Added 2hm_idle
